author: inphi
content:
Is there a (tentative) spec for adding withdrawals to the JSON-RPC? Not all clients include the withdrawals object in response to block queries and I'd like to know what the right behavior here. Specifically, geth does not include withdrawals while nethermind does. I'm doing some interop testing and seeing issues as lighthouse makes block queries for its beacon API and it expects withdrawals to be available via block JSON-RPC.
